comments: Since Luocha's heals scale off his ATK, you want to invest mainly in that stat. Still, giving him some HP% is advised, especially if you plan to run him as your solo defensive option.
substats: Effect RES until 30% (if running Broken Keel) > Speed > ATK% > Break Effect > HP% = DEF%
traces_priority: Cleansing Revival > Sanctified > Through the Valley
name: Pure Healer
